summary: This is a little mod which changes the vanilla water textures of shore in to different ones.
descriptionHtml:
This is a little mod which changes the vanilla textures of shore in to different ones. The first version only changes water but there is going to be other textures as well.

How is the water texture different from vanilla texture? First of all (believe it or not), it\'s only 256x256 pixels and instead of common blue-purple normal map texture, I used green/yellow-red normal map texture. Water of this mod also reflects light more realistically.

This is a small mod but if you like it/it\'s idea then I might make it bigger. I would be glad for help and tips as well. Report all bugs you find to me.

[b]Install[/b]
1. Download the file
2. Open the archive with a program such as WinRAR
3. Locate your Skyrim folder and extract the files from the archive
4. Play and see if it works.

[b]Uninstall[/b]
Delete the water folder found inside ...Data\\textures\\

[b]Versions[/b]
Water v1
-smooth water texture

Water v1a
-bigger texture size (sharper)
-smaller wave size
-smaller light reflections

Future Versions:
Ground v1
-ground textures changed

Water v2
-even better water
-HD?
author: Veloxization
